SPIFLASH_PHY
============

+------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------+

SPIFLASH_PHY_CLK_DIVISOR
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

`Address: 0x82002000 + 0x0 = 0x82002000`
